com.centurylink.mdw.activity.types

Interface AdapterActivity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GeneralActivity
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdapterActivityBase, ConnectionPoolAdapter, DocumentWebServiceAdapter, FileWriterAdapter, HttpServiceAdapter, JdbcSqlAdapter, JmsAdapter, LdapAdapter, MdwRpcWebServiceAdapter, MultiRestServiceAdapter, OAuthServiceAdapter, PoolableAdapterBase, PublishEventMessageRest, RestServiceAdapter, SlackNotificationAdapter, SoapWebServiceAdapter, SocketAdapter

    public interface AdapterActivity
extends GeneralActivity
    Interface distinguishing new adapter activities. This is to replace ControlledAdapterActivity eventually.

      • isSynchronous

        boolean isSynchronous()
        Determine if the adapter itself is synchronous, i.e. waiting for responses.
        Returns:
        true if it needs to wait for responses
